task.title: Export Audio from Speech Analysis
task.shortdesc: Export the current audio (.wav) segment from the Speech Analysis view.

taskbody.prereq: A media file must already be linked to the session and segmented.

step.cmd: Click the Save... button inside the Speech Analysis view.
step.stepresult: A Browse window will appear prompting you to choose a save location for your segment.

step.cmd: Specify a filename for the segment, navigate to the appropriate save location in the Browse window, and click Save.
step.stepresult: A .wav audio file of the current segment will be created at the specified file location.
